name: Aliens VS Guns Arcade Game
description:
Release 1.0:

The game is now finished and I will not plan to update this game any further except bug fixes and occasional free dlc maps.

As of this release there are 4 weapons, a high score system and instant death.

How to play:

WASD, Space, Clicking and numbers 1-4.

Update 1.1:

  • Fixed a bug that would cause weapons to remain visible after colission with an explosion
